definition: earth/dust/clay/local/indigenous/crude opium/unsophisticated/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The plumbothorite discovered for the first time is a new variety of thorite.
sentences.chinese: 铅钍石是钍石的新变种，属首次发现。

sentences.english: The plumbothorite discovered for the first time is a new variety of thorite.
sentences.chinese: 铅钍石是钍石的新变种，属首次发现。

sentences.english: Followed by the slow decomposition of uranium to another element thorium .
sentences.chinese: 铀元素随后缓慢分解为另一种元素钍。

sentences.english: The daughter nuclides of radon and thoron tend to become attached.
sentences.chinese: 氡和钍射气的子体易被气溶胶吸附。

sentences.english: Compared to uranium, thorium is far more abundant as well as much more energy-dense.
sentences.chinese: 与铀相比，钍的储藏量更为丰富，能量密度也更高。

sentences.english: Rare earth mines often also contain radioactive elements, such as uranium and thorium.
sentences.chinese: 稀土矿山常常也含有放射性元素，比如铀和钍。

sentences.english: The calculation from the neutrino work yields 20 terawatts for uranium and thorium.
sentences.chinese: 从中微子工作计算出铀和钍约产出20太瓦。

sentences.english: This paper describes a rapid method for the separation and determination of microgram amounts of scandium and thorium.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出一萃取分离和测定微克量钪与钍的快速方法。

sentences.english: Thorium-based molten salt nuclear reactors for the future!
sentences.chinese: 为了未来的钍基熔盐核反应堆。

sentences.english: Uranium or thorium ores and concentrates.
Thorium is separated by extraction chromatography.
There are a number of different ways to use thorium to produce electricity.
sentences.chinese: 用钍发电有许多不同的方式。

definition: deuterium 2H/heavy hydrogen, isotope of hydrogen having 1 neutron in its nucleus, so atomic weight 2
tritium 3H/radioactive isotope of hydrogen having 2 neutrons in its nucleus, so atomic weight 3
see 釕銱兒|钌铞儿[liao4 diao4 r5]/Taiwan pr. [liao3]
